description: The Apsalus III is the end result of Ginias Saharin`s top-secret weapon development project, a huge, non-humanoid "mobile armour" armed with an incredibly powerful mega particle cannon. Like the previous prototype versions of the Apsalus, it`s equipped with a lift-generating "Minovsky craft" system which allows it to fly at high speeds, ascend into space, and re-enter Earth`s atmosphere directly over its chosen target. If Ginias is able to complete the Apsalus project, no Federation base - not even the underground fortress of Jaburo - will be safe.
name: Apsaras III
